chat.title: route for maxeran/dex
chat.message: add PO (not sure if this is a drop down)

chat.title: CT angio
chat.message: add CTA option, this is become more and more common when looking for SAH (re: aneurysm), mass, RCVS, etc.

chat.title: meds
chat.message:
- Tylenol 1g (we frequently only have 500mg tabs at triage)
- (meh) add Benadryl if people want to "pretreat for EPS" when using maxeran (I don't do this but some might still)
- add haldol
- add sumatriptan 6mg SC (or another triptan)
